objects.text:
• Liver Cleanse & Detox Formula
• Contains Milk Thistle Extract
• Turmeric & Artichoke Extracts
• Supports Digestive Health

product_details.description: LIVER CLEANSE, DETOX & REPAIR : Detox supplement capsule, liver aid for alcohol detox is a liver cleanse formula. This liver aid supplement contains milk thistle extract. Milk thistle helps support and repair for active liver health and function.* LIVER SUPPORT SUPPLEMENT WITH MILK THISTLE, TUMERIC & ARTICHOKE EXTRACTS: A fatty liver supplement, liver and kidney cleanse detox* Milk Thistle liver detox formula made to support & aid liver health. Detox cleanse. liver supplements for men & women. LIVER HEALTH SUPPLEMENTS FOR MEN & WOMEN: For indigestion & bloating relief, cramping, flatulence and indigestion.* Liver pills support liver repair, plus support liver cleanse detox & repair fatty liver* Kidney cleanse detox & repair formula. ANTIOXIDANT RICH ARTICHOKE EXTRACT LIVER HEALTH FORMULA: This detox and digestive aid pill with milk thistle and turmeric. These are two ingredients with antioxidant properties that help reduce potential free radical damage.* 2 LIVER SUPPLEMENT PILLS DAILY FOR LIVER HEALTH: Take 2 Liver tablets supplements daily during or immediately after a meal, or as directed by a healthcare professional. Made in GMP-certified and FDA-registered facilities. Brand - Swisse ** Item Form - Tablet ** Manufacturer - Swisse Wellness, Inc. ** Item Package Quantity - 1 ** Package Information - Bottle **

banner_details:
The banner features a health and wellness theme centered on a liver detox product. It uses bold, eye-catching text with a clean and modern layout. The top section contains the main headline (`heading`) in a bold dark green, followed by a secondary subheading (`subheading`) in a brighter green tone, promoting daily health benefits. A multi-line text block (`description`) lists key product features in a clear, easy-to-read font. The middle of the banner displays a realistic product image (`product_image`) with tablets for context. The bottom includes prominent pricing (`price`) and a green call-to-action button (`cta_background` and `cta`) to encourage purchase.

**Color Palette:**
- Background off-white: `#F5F7F0`
- Bold green: `#2E5E28`
- Bright green: `#3D9937`
- Accent green: `#8CC63F`
- Dark text: `#333333`
- White text: `#FFFFFF`
product_color: The product image uses a clean and vibrant color palette that reflects health and freshness. Key colors include a vivid lime green (#A4D65E), which dominates the cap and bottom section, symbolizing wellness and vitality. White (#FFFFFF) is used extensively as a background, providing contrast and clarity to the text. Black (#000000) is employed for primary information, ensuring readability, while red (#D32F2F) in the Swisse logo draws immediate attention and adds brand authority. The harmonious blend of green and white conveys cleanliness, while the controlled use of bold red highlights the brand without overpowering. These colors together create a fresh, trustworthy aesthetic.
